prefixes.name: Frozen
prefixes.description: Adds ice damage to attacks, with a chance to freeze enemies.

prefixes.name: Shocking
prefixes.description: Adds lightning damage to attacks, with a chance to shock enemies.

prefixes.name: Venomous
prefixes.description: Adds poison damage to attacks over time.

prefixes.name: Frostbound
prefixes.description: Reduces movement speed but increases cold damage.

prefixes.name: Cursed
prefixes.description: Reduces resistances but greatly increases attack power.

prefixes.name: Bloodthirsty
prefixes.description: Increases life leech but decreases defense.

prefixes.name: Blazing
prefixes.description: Grants a chance to ignite enemies.

prefixes.name: Thunderous
prefixes.description: Grants a chance to stun enemies.

prefixes.name: Berserker
prefixes.description: Increases attack damage as health decreases.

prefixes.name: Fiery
prefixes.description: Adds a burning effect to attacks.

prefixes.name: Icy
prefixes.description: Adds a slowing effect to attacks.

prefixes.name: Stormy
prefixes.description: Adds a chance to chain lightning to attacks.

prefixes.name: Temporal
prefixes.description: Increases time-based effects and cooldown reduction.

prefixes.name: Ethereal
prefixes.description: Increases dodge chance and magic resistance.

prefixes.name: Brutal
prefixes.description: Increases damage at the cost of accuracy.

prefixes.name: Zealous
prefixes.description: Increases holy power and healing effects.

prefixes.name: Corrupted
prefixes.description: Decreases resistances but increases critical strike chance.

prefixes.name: Chaotic
prefixes.description: Grants random bonus effects with each attack.

prefixes.name: Explorer's
prefixes.description: Increases map speed and navigation bonuses.

prefixes.name: Hunter's
prefixes.description: Increases effectiveness with bows and traps.

prefixes.name: Arcane-Touched
prefixes.description: Grants a chance to enhance magic attacks.

prefixes.name: Titanforged
prefixes.description: Grants a boost to all stats.

prefixes.name: Blood-Forged
prefixes.description: Increases lifesteal at the cost of max health.

prefixes.name: Heavenly
prefixes.description: Increases healing effects and light-based resistances.

prefixes.name: Shadowed
prefixes.description: Increases damage during night or darkness.

prefixes.name: Oathbound
prefixes.description: Grants a protective shield when blocking.

prefixes.name: Demonic
prefixes.description: Increases damage at the cost of max health.

prefixes.name: Feral
prefixes.description: Increases speed and attack power when low on health.

prefixes.name: Echoing
prefixes.description: Increases the range and effectiveness of shouts.

prefixes.name: Sandworn
prefixes.description: Increases resistances to earth and sand attacks.

prefixes.name: Starforged
prefixes.description: Increases star-based magic damage and resistances.

prefixes.name: Phoenix
prefixes.description: Grants a chance to revive after death.

suffixes.name: of the Phoenix
suffixes.description: Grants a small chance to revive on death.

suffixes.name: of the Paladin
suffixes.description: Increases holy power and healing effects.

suffixes.name: of the Berserker
suffixes.description: Increases attack power as health decreases.

suffixes.name: of the Thunderlord
suffixes.description: Grants lightning resistance and a chance to stun.

suffixes.name: of the Frost King
suffixes.description: Increases cold resistance and slows enemies.

suffixes.name: of the Rogue
suffixes.description: Increases critical hit chance and evasion.

suffixes.name: of the Tempest
suffixes.description: Grants a chance to summon a storm on hit.

suffixes.name: of the Beast
suffixes.description: Increases damage to animals and beasts.

suffixes.name: of the Crusader
suffixes.description: Increases damage to undead and demons.

suffixes.name: of the Mystic
suffixes.description: Increases mana regeneration and magic defense.

suffixes.name: of the Warlord
suffixes.description: Increases melee combat power and defense.

suffixes.name: of the Falcon
suffixes.description: Increases agility and ranged attack power.

suffixes.name: of the Night
suffixes.description: Increases damage in darkness or at night.
